Cardi denied touching Ellis, calling the case frivolous and vowing to countersue similar claims.

title: Endangered knowledge: Why humanities education is losing its footing in America
description: Humanities education, once the intellectual cornerstone of American universities, is facing a historic retreat as programmes are cut, enrolments collapse, and funding models prioritise workforce returns over cultural inquiry. While elite institutions and wealthy donors are preserving liberal arts for the privileged, public universities retreat, raising urgent questions of access, democracy, and the future of intellectual life in America.

title: Bank Holidays in India 2025: Are banks open or closed today on Wednesday, September 3? Check city-wise list

title: CRDA to acquire 1,800 acres in Amaravati for capital development

title: Asia Cup 2025: Are Suryakumar Yadav’s India undercooked? Big continental test awaits
description: Defending champions India enter the Asia Cup 2025 as favorites, despite a recent lack of T20I match practice. Irfan Pathan believes India's strong NCA system ensures adequate preparation, cautioning them mainly against Afghanistan's potent spinners. He also highlighted Shubman Gill's vice-captaincy as beneficial and revealed Rohit Sharma's desire to continue playing ODIs, contingent on maintaining fitness and game-time.

title: 'Coolie' Box Office collection day 20: Rajinikanth’s action film mints Rs 1.10 crore
description: Rajinikanth's 'Coolie' continues its box office run into its third week. The film experienced a weekend surge in collections. However, weekday earnings saw a decline. 'Coolie' has earned Rs 281.30 crore in India so far. 'War 2', another release, lags behind 'Coolie' in earnings. The film 'Coolie' stars Rajinikanth as Deva, a former union leader.

title: Judge orders search shakeup in Google monopoly case but keeps hands off Chrome and default deals
description: The judge refrained from ordering a sale of Chrome because he decided there wasn’t adequate proof the browser served as an essential ingredient in Google’s search monopoly, making a divestiture “a poor fit for this case”

description: Manoj Jarange ended his hunger strike after the Maharashtra government conceded to several demands aimed at simplifying the process for Marathas with Kunbi antecedents to obtain OBC certificates. While blanket reservation was deemed legally untenable, the government agreed to implement the Hyderabad gazette and establish village-level committees to facilitate certificate issuance.

While framed as national security, critics see it as political, leaving a generation of Palestinians cut off from vital opportunities abroad.

title: Youngest woman billionaire on leaving college; parents reaction; money lessons
